reviews.text: Professional, kind and attentive service. Gorgeous food (and wine) served at a perfect pace in a cozy atmosphere.  There are no words to describe the shrimp carpaccio, even if the crêpe filled with mushrooms and black truffle was just a dream. Thank you Rafa and the whole team for a wonderful experience!!

We didnt speak spanish at all so the service was not that good. The food was served through menus which was good. Tips were added to the bill straight without asking and it was 20 % of the total price. That was unexpected and expensive way to show that we werent welcomed.
We had a wonderful menu full of taste and surprising combinations. Thank you for the service and good food!

What an amazing experience. Absolutely high quality food, prepared very well and coming along with a very unique and authentic waiter who might also be the boss. Take some money because it's not cheap, but worth every single euro. Go there, you won't regret it.

A truly wonderful eatery, this. A nice, laid back ambience with exceptional food. I had the six course tasting menu and, not only was it fabulous, but it cost me just €30! You could pay a lot more for food that isn't half as good.

And the owners took pity on me and my minimal Spanish and chatted with me in French, which gave me a faint chance of knowing what I was ordering.

My highlight of my trip, dining-wise. Don't hesitate to give it a try.
